title: 820-00597 2017 imac 21.5” Display turning back off during boot
message: This iMac boots normal. It then display goes off and doesn’t come back on. When display is off only 2 LED indicators on and no external display either. Sometimes it will come back on and reboot on its own , but usually it just stays off. It will with enough time boot up again with proper display. Display connectors and cables are perfect. I don't have another display or cables to test.

title: 820-00597 2017 imac 21.5” Display turning back off during boot
message:
Missing internal and external video at same time, points to GPU issue.
Try heating it, for test.
